text:
@WhiteHouse > 111,000 Coronavirus Deaths and counting

> Teargassed innocent protestors to make way for backwards-upside-down-holding Bible op

> Hid in bunker like a #Bunkerbaby

> Built a 13 foot wall around The People's House

> Militarized police against his own citizens
